meanings.definition: Decorated with jewels or precious stones.
meanings.sent1: The queen wore a bejewelled crown to the royal ball.
meanings.sent2: The bejewelled necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The bejewelled cat collar made Mr. Whiskers look like a fancy feline.
meanings.sent4: Her bejewelled smile lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The bejewelled dress shimmered like a thousand stars.

meanings.definition: Adorned with jewels or precious stones.
meanings.sent1: The bejewelled bracelet glistened on her wrist.
meanings.sent2: The bejewelled tiara added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The bejewelled phone case made her smartphone look like a royal device.
meanings.sent4: Her bejewelled shoes clicked on the marble floor like tiny crystals.
meanings.sent5: The bejewelled sword gleamed in the knight's hand.

meanings.definition: Covered in jewels or precious stones.
meanings.sent1: The bejewelled gown draped elegantly on the mannequin.
meanings.sent2: The bejewelled chandelier illuminated the grand hall.
meanings.sent3: The bejewelled cake looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The bejewelled statue stood majestically in the center of the square.
meanings.sent5: The bejewelled watch on his wrist caught everyone's eye.
